b52.title: Ribosomal protein S6 phosphorylation is a determinant of cell size and glucose homeostasis
b52.reason: This study reports that a mouse bearing serine to alanine substitutions at all five phosphorylatable serines in ribosomal protein S6 does not experience any global defects in translation

b111.title: Regulation of TORC1 by Rag GTPases in nutrient response
b111.reason: this study defines the Rag-GTPases as a second upstream signalling branch that transduces amino acid availability to mTORC1

b167.title: Table 1: Sociodemographic Characteristics (Baranyi et al., 2015a; Baranyi et al., 2015b; Baranyi et al., 2016).
b167.reason: this study describes the molecular action of the cytoplasmic 'nutrient sensors

b277.title: Nitrogen Source Activates TOR (Target of Rapamycin) Complex 1 via Glutamine and Independently of Gtr/Rag Proteins
b277.reason: This study finds that nitrogen sources can activate TORC1 in prototrophic yeast strains in a transient, Rag-dependent manner, although sustained activation by glutamine may feed through an alternative mechanism
